summary: This week I added a new Clearing status page, a Terrarium creative canvas to the workshop, and a three-column layout for the workshop on large screens. I also fixed a bunch of accessibility warnings from our audit and made subdomain links on the roadmap clickable. The rest was mostly documentation, adding ASCII art headers to specs and refining some diagrams.

features: add 3-column layout for workshop page on large displays
fixes: Address high-priority accessibility warnings from audit
